title: GOT PERMABANNED AFTER 1 DISCUSSION WITH THE TEAM
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Raining In NYC: I wonder which midlaner they have :p
Raining In NYC: lux ?
Raining In NYC: yasuo ?
Raining In NYC: he can be toplane too :p
Raining In NYC: ok he is mid
In-Game
Raining In NYC: wtf N?
Raining In NYC: sejani
Raining In NYC: sejuani do you have a mini map ?
Raining In NYC: unbelievable
Raining In NYC: nerf
Raining In NYC: this yasuo needs only few hits and i am dead already.. gj riot
Raining In NYC: you push all the time and u don't ward
Raining In NYC: you are actually playing bad
Raining In NYC: but playing op champ
Raining In NYC: sigh
Raining In NYC: would have been nice if you could stayed more mid whilst vi and lux was focusing me
Raining In NYC: omg
Raining In NYC: this team
Raining In NYC: all me ?
Raining In NYC: there are wards
Raining In NYC: you can buy wards
Raining In NYC: :)
Raining In NYC: gg
Raining In NYC: yes
Raining In NYC: i wait for you
Raining In NYC: and u come too late
Raining In NYC: was waiting for you ..
Raining In NYC: lol dude i have full hp
Raining In NYC: nice ss bot
Raining In NYC: jinx  4 deaths
Raining In NYC: botlane 7 deaths
Raining In NYC: don't blame me
Raining In NYC: i am good
Raining In NYC: because htis yasuo needs to benerfed
Raining In NYC: blame riot for making such an op champ with those items and conqueor
Raining In NYC: its not normal that yasuo can just perma Q with 2 sec cd .. better nerf his kit
Raining In NYC: not anymore after they nerf her
Raining In NYC: now she is ok
Raining In NYC: But still if i face ap champs ..
Raining In NYC: meanwhile bot and top
Raining In NYC: 5 mid
Raining In NYC: gg
Raining In NYC: this team sucks
Raining In NYC: they don't defend objectives or come mid to help me and sejuani
Raining In NYC: no I don't like this game anymore since it's teambased .. solo queing died
Raining In NYC: u are rported for flame
Raining In NYC: his Q
Raining In NYC: deals too much damage wtf
Raining In NYC: 483 damage with one Q ?
Raining In NYC: dafack
Raining In NYC: dude 3 Q
Raining In NYC: and i am dead
Raining In NYC: not
Raining In NYC: its 1,3 sec
Raining In NYC: cd
Raining In NYC: this jinx
Raining In NYC: jinx
Raining In NYC: learn to Q
Raining In NYC: and W
Raining In NYC: did drake
Raining In NYC: why are u there ?
Raining In NYC: no objective
Raining In NYC: nerf pls
Raining In NYC: report my team for flame
Raining In NYC: sejuani toxic
Raining In NYC: just report him for being a clown
Raining In NYC: it's not fun
Raining In NYC: stfu
Raining In NYC: noob
Raining In NYC: pff
Raining In NYC: op hcamp
Raining In NYC: reported
Raining In NYC: you
Raining In NYC: You will throw a smile on my face when you get permabanned :)
Raining In NYC: wtf
Raining In NYC: gfg
Raining In NYC: jinx , sejuani , brand are so bad
Raining In NYC: you saw brand flash ?
Post-Game
Raining In NYC: report sejujani
Raining In NYC: pls
Raining In NYC: for toxicity
Raining In NYC: unskilled player ?
Raining In NYC: you ?
Raining In NYC: yasuo is OP champ
Raining In NYC: irelia is not op anymore
Raining In NYC: after they nerf her so hard
Raining In NYC: i main irelia
Raining In NYC: misplay ?
Raining In NYC: because i only play 3 champs
Raining In NYC: just report evil jam jar
Raining In NYC: haha stay in bronze
Raining In NYC: :)
Raining In NYC: i am actually diamond 2 in main acc
Raining In NYC: you guys never will reach that
Raining In NYC: ;)


I am done with this game,
1 discussion and i got permabanned already LOL !
They were the one who were toxic against me... 
Saying that I am challenger and make challenger plays in a sarcastic way made me angry and I just defend with this text...

replies.body:
> 1 discussion and i got permabanned already LOL !

You don't get permanently suspended because of that. In order to get permanently suspended, you have to keep exhibiting negative behavioural patterns throughout an extended period of time, without showing much or any effort to reform. I'm assuming your account has been through all three punishment stages (or just the 14-day one), which renders this punishment completely justified (due to your negativity and toxic behaviour). Even the smallest mistake after your 14-day account suspension is enough to end up in a permanent suspension. It even says so in their reform card (something along the lines of this being your final warning).
Funny , I bought an account on lol websites and I play a game and got permabanned after one discussion
This is another reason why I find it stupid to buy accounts. Yours had a 14-day ban.

That's really unfair !!! 
So i can submit a ticket to that website that offered me an account for cheap and get another one ? :)
And it'll quickly get banned after you start playing on it.
How ?

> [{quoted}](name=Raining In NYC,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zmAgMr0o,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-12T13:00:27.469+0000)
>
> How ?

Because buying accounts is prohibited and ends up in immediate account termination upon detection.

> [{quoted}](name=Raining In NYC,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zmAgMr0o,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-12T13:00:27.469+0000)
>
> How ?

Riot bans bot accounts all the time through various detection methods. I suggest simply making a smurf.
This account had indeed a 14 day suspension .. I posted a ticket to g2a support for another account or money back.. Feel ripped!
Well buying selling Accounts is against the rules. So i doubt they will Care that it got banned.
Great ! I didn't know ...
Unfortunate way to get to know but nothing you can do. When buying a Account you dont even have to agree to the Terms of service so its not even really Something to blame.

thats against the damn rules

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> You will throw a smile on my face when you get permabanned :)

Love this part
Well it's not funny that teammates flames at you and I just trying to defend against them. You don't even know what they said before that discussion ....

apparently you didnt mute them, thus you didnt defend yourself. 
and that makes this part really funny.
btw
:) here is your smile
Hey, itâ€™s okay! You can always play on your Diamond 2 Main Account :)

I've listed all your infractions:
>1.) Said someone on your team was playing bad.
>2.) Saying your team sucks.
>3.) Telling someone you will be reporting them. 
>4.) Telling someone to "stay in bronze."

These are all against the rules. Let me give you some tips to son how to convey similar messages without breaking the rules next time. Use the following phrases to replace what you said above.
>1.) I know you can play better. I believe in you! :)
>2.) Our team isn't playing at it's best. I know we can do better! :)
>3.) Please do not break the rules. Riot may decide punish you. :(
>4.) In the future, we will be at different elos.

Yes ok but permabanning goes a bit too far. Even if i am toxic then give me perma ban chat restriction. But not permaban in the game ?! 
Just spend money to play again ranked because i like the game so much but if anyone flames me i just flame back. 
If someone kicks you in the face you will stay on the ground or fight back ? :)

> [{quoted}](name=Raining In NYC,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zmAgMr0o,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-02-12T13:08:38.438+0000)
>
> Yes ok but permabanning goes a bit too far. Even if i am toxic then give me perma ban chat restriction. 

I believe Riot tested limiting determined "toxic" people's chat, but the people were still toxic. Communication is too important in the game to disable players from chatting.

Ok thank you for your help. Will not buy accounts anymore.. can only learn from this situation. 

But now i can't play :(
I thought you had a main account that was D2?
Why me ... I am the victim here of this situation and no one wants to help me..

> [{quoted}](name=Raining In NYC,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zmAgMr0o,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-02-12T13:16:54.608+0000)
>
> Why me ... I am the victim here of this situation and no one wants to help me..

No, the victims are the people who have to deal with these accounts being autoleveled by scripters. In a game I played earlier today, someone was autoleveling an account with a low-quality script that just repeatedly right-clicked the enemy Nexus, going 0/20/0 in 24 minutes. The Ez who was hoping to have some fun in mid ended up going 1/2/7 because he had to deal with a super-fed Ori. He's a victim.

You are not a victim.

**GOT PERMABANNED AFTER MULTIPLE PUNISHMENTS AND THEN CONTINUED TO FLAME THE TEAM**

Fixed that for ya.
Actually, no. He bought an account that likely got a 14-day ban.

>Raining In NYC: You will throw a smile on my face when you get permabanned :)

Guess you threw a smile onto our faces when you got permabanned :)
If that is what you consider a discussion, I don't want to see an argument.

> Raining In NYC: report my team for flame
Raining In NYC: just report him for being a clown
Raining In NYC: stfu
Raining In NYC: noob
Raining In NYC: report sejujani

So I presume you had a 14-day ban already. After that you should drop all negative act as next offence as you know is a permaban. Report calling is pointless, so it is considered negative behavior. Also you constantly were talking your team down.

> They were the one who were toxic against me...
Saying that I am challenger and make challenger plays in a sarcastic way made me angry and I just defend with this text...

Why try to argue with them? It won't change their opinion, should've just muted + reported instead of doing this, as you can see it resulted in a ban for you.
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
